content: Hi, I'm having issues with my recent order. The report says that my package was delivered on time, but I never received it.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide me with your order number so I can look into this further?
My order number is #1234. However, when I checked my email, there was no confirmation of delivery.
Thank you for providing that information. I've checked on your order status and it appears that the package was indeed delivered on time. Can you please provide me with a copy of your shipping label?
I don't have access to my shipping label. The report says that it was sent via email, but I never received it.
I've checked on your account and we couldn't find any record of an email being sent with the shipping label. Can you please provide me with a copy of your order confirmation email?
